Class Cinema

java.lang.Object
model.Cinema
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cinema extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Cinema.

2022-10-30

  • Field Details

    • index

      private int index
      The index of the cinema.

    • cinemaCode

      private String cinemaCode
      The unique code of each cinema. 1st letter -> Represents the cineplex. 2nd letter -> Cinema number corresponding to the alphabet. (e.g B == 2) 3rd letter -> N or P -> Normal or Platinum. e.g "ABN" -> cineplex1, cinema1, Normal.

    • isPlatinum

      private boolean isPlatinum
      The type of the cinema.

    • cineplexName

      private String cineplexName
      The name of the cineplex.

    • layout

      private Seat[][] layout
      The seats in the cinema.

    • rowLength

      private int rowLength
      The number of rows of seats.

    • columnLength

      private int columnLength
      The number of columns of seats.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(int index, String cinemaCode, boolean isPlatinum, String cineplex, int rowLength, int columnLength)
      Constructs a new Cinema with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the Cinema.
      cinemaCode - The Cinema code.
      isPlatinum - Whether Cinema is Normal or Platinum
      cineplex - The name of the Cineplex.
      rowLength - The number of rows of seats.
      columnLength - The number of columns of seats.

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(Cinema a)
      Simplified constructor of the class. (used in show class)
      Parameters:
      a - The Cinema to be copied.

      public boolean[][] getLayout()
      Finds the status of seats. (Occupied or not)
      Returns:

    • assignSeat

      public void assignSeat(int row, int column)
      Assigns a seat by setting it to be occupied.
      Parameters:
      row - The corresponding row of the seat.
      column - The corresponding column of the seat.
